channel.title: Kawasaki KDX, ready to sell!
channel.description:
Totally forgot to update my kawasaki project thread, so here it is finished. I would have build it even better, but I'm out of money and I need to sell it now.. :)
Anyways, here are the before & after pictures: Before [img]http://www.motot.net/galleria/data/3/23915/medium/vasensivu.JPG[/img] After [img]http://www.motot.net/galleria/data/3/23915/medium/Valokuva236.jpg[/img]
Next project will be Opel Calibra, just need to get new transmission. Already bought new front and rear bumber. I might post a topic about it also.
Tho I'm pretty interested in BMW 325 e30 cabriolet, or Toyta Corolla KE70 for winter.... ;) [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2009, 07:44:42 pm[/size][hr]Haha, totally forgot this thread.
Well, the bike is now ready for sell. I would have made even better, but I'm out of money so I have to sell it...
Anyways, here are the before & after pictures: Before [img]http://www.motot.net/galleria/data/3/23915/medium/vasensivu.JPG[/img] After [img]http://www.motot.net/galleria/data/3/23915/medium/Valokuva236.jpg[/img]
Next project will be Opel Calibra, just need to get new transmission. Already bought new front and rear bumber. I might post a topic about it also.
Tho I'm pretty interested in BMW 325 e30 cabriolet, or Toyta Corolla KE70 for winter.... ;)

item.title: Kawasaki KDX, ready to sell!
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:22, topic:269705”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=355968.msg2727898#msg2727898 date=1238504482]
nigger track is nigger.
[/quote]
Agreed. Wet sand sucks, it sticks to you, makes you heavy, gets in your lungs/mouth/eyes.[/quote]

eww… Sand… I’m glad i dont have to race Australian tracks. I LOATH cruddy tracks. We have the tracks that get muddy and have 3 foot ruts in them. My first 2 races already have been canceled this year.

Read full topic

item.title: Kawasaki KDX, ready to sell!
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

ShitRacer, you should check your vagina. There might be sand inside it. Is that why you are so negative? Or are you just jealous?

Noone would steal it.
If that meant that my bike is cheaper or shittier than your ex YZ, you are wrong. They are both fucking cheap, and almost same value.
Wasn't his choice of color, it's a Kawasaki, it's typically Green and doesn't suit otherwise.
Why do you think it wasn't my choice of color? Nobody else decided it for me. Why do you think kawasaki doesn't suit otherwise than green? There are plenty of other color alternatives for Kawasaki bikes, and infact this bike used to be blue.

Grow up, kid.

vittu mitä provoo, katotaan tarttuuko syöttiin. kalastel

Read full topic

item.title: Kawasaki KDX, ready to sell!
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Secet, post:13, topic:269705”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=355968.msg2725151#msg2725151 date=1238281709]
Shit bike is shit.
[/quote]
Well atleast it’s not stolen.[/quote]
Noone would steal it.

Ford 2 Race:

Nice choice of colour, looks great.

Wasn’t his choice of color, it’s a Kawasaki, it’s typically Green and doesn’t suit otherwise.

[quote=“ranger squad, post:9, topic:269705”][quote author=io9 link=topic=355968.msg2725465#msg2725465 date=1238303319]

Shit bike is shit.

No bike is worse.
[/quote]

You two just hate everything, don’t you.
Every single thing someone does, you jump straight on it and diss it.
I may only be twelve, but I still know how to tell retards like you two how to SHUT THE FUCK UP.[/quote]
We can see that you’re twelve, and in fact I was mucking around you idiot. I have quite a broad knowledge of motorcycles, this was my bike:
(note, that is 3 years old, that was the day before my first race in 85’s which was like when I was 11).
is the most recent picture of it, in this picture it has new pipe (I don’t like a standard 85 pipe, I prefer a big wide one like a 250 two-strokes), new engine, new suspension, basically everything new on it that YJDT helped me with.

Read full topic

item.title: Kawasaki KDX, ready to sell!
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:2, topic:269705”]It looks really nice, good job!

Are you sure you don’t need a new bottom under that Calibra? Those things vanish after a few years.[/quote]

Probably, especifically in Finland rust is really bad problem, because they use salt to defrost snow on roads = more rust.
Bottom is pretty good now, but I will reinforce it before next winter.

[quote=“Uriko, post:3, topic:269705”]Thank you. Didn’t even know we have this kind of subforum. I usually only read General and Discussions.
Really sex. Nice job, should be in Petrolheads though?[/quote]

Read full topic
